General.Name: GCL Energy Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: GCL Energy Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the development of clean energy projects in China. It is also involved in the product research and development and battery replacement activities. The company offers gas turbine cogeneration, wind power, and waste-to-energy services. In addition, the company provides electricity, heat, cold, and other energy products for power grid corporates, cities, and industrial parks. The company is headquartered in Suzhou, China. GCL Energy Technology Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of GCL (Group) Holdings Co., Ltd.

6.Name: Mr. Qiang  Shen
6.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
